intro: Chromatotriccum tubiflorum, commonly known as the tubular flowered chromatic plant, is a flowering plant species native to specific regions of South America. The plant belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is known for its showy, clustered inflorescences.
